name: Armed Conquest
description:
Crashed, stranded, your pod is beyond recovery. Fight your way through a mysterious alien planet where everything appears to want you dead. 

Armed with a pistol and a couple spare magazines, survive using whatever weaponry and ammunition you come across. Round up any survivors as there is greater power in numbers.

Controls:

  • Left mouse click to shoot
  • AD / left and right arrow keys to move
  • Space to jump
  • Esc / P to pause
  • E to interact
  • H to heal
  • R to respawn
  • Q to swap weapon
  • C to rally squad members to your position

Developed by Sergei Bakharev, Ivan Hristov, and Gabriela Lenkov as their Capstone Project at the University of Washington.

This game is currently in the prototype stage, meaning that it is a small demo that we have released to see what people think of the game idea. Please leave us feedback on your experience as well as any improvements you would like to see! 

In this build, we have one fully constructed level for you to demo, the other 24 are merely placeholders to give an idea of what the level select screen may look like. If the audience reception is in favor, we will continue the development & refinement of Armed Conquest!
